title: You are about to win then your team surrenders...
body:
I've had that happen many times. 

Have you?

replies.body:
if you troll me with a surrender vote I will vote yes just because fuck you for trolling.

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/046/629/1270140664297.jpg

I was once in a team with a 4-man premade that did this.  We got to the enemy nexus, 1-2 hits left on it, and they surrendered.  Apparently one of them was dropping to bronze for a climb video series, but it screwed me along the way.

i hate people like that is it not visible to them or something?
i feel like i need to go to their house walk into their room slap a sign on their screen saying "WE ARE WINNING" say "no" to them then walk out.
